interfaces.description: Defines the custom interfaces used by the module.
interfaces.eventDescription: Defines the custom events used by the component's emit.
interfaces.methodDescription: Defines methods that can be accessed by the component's reference.
interfaces.typeDescription: Defines the custom types used by the module.

formProps.description: Defines valid properties in form create component.

props.name: sections
props.description: each section will have array of inputs as value and section title as key

props.name: options
props.description: options to control how the form will look

props.name: submitHandler
props.description: this used on submitting the form

props.name: toastHandler
props.description: this used wo show certain success message after success

types.description: Defines the custom types used by the module.
